eegdash.dataset.DS005342
========================

EEG data offline and online during motor imagery for standing and sitting (OpenNeuro ``ds005342``). Access recordings and metadata through EEGDash.

.. rst-class:: sd-badges

:bdg-light:`Modality: eeg` :bdg-light:`Tasks: 1` :bdg-light:`License: CC0` :bdg-light:`Subjects: 32` :bdg-light:`Recordings: 32` :bdg-light:`Source: openneuro`

     - Nayid Triana-Guzman, Alvaro D Orjuela-Cañon, Andres L Jutinico, Omar Mendoza-Montoya, Javier M Antelis

     - `OpenNeuro <https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds005342>`__ | `NeMAR <https://nemar.org/dataexplorer/detail?dataset_id=ds005342>`__

Quickstart
----------

**Install**

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install eegdash

**Load a recording**

.. code-block:: python

   from eegdash.dataset import DS005342

   dataset = DS005342(cache_dir="./data")
   recording = dataset[0]
   raw = recording.load()

**Filter/query**

.. tab-set::

   .. tab-item:: Basic

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS005342(cache_dir="./data", subject="01")

   .. tab-item:: Advanced

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS005342(
             cache_dir="./data",
             query={"subject": {"$in": ["01", "02"]}},
         )
